jobDescription: This position is part of MITRE’s DOJ Cyber Portfolio and supports a national law enforcement sponsor with a variety of technical tasks in the areas of cyber security and systems engineering. This project offers the opportunity to dive into complex and rewarding work with high visibility and potential to influence government strategy and direction. As a Lead System Integrator you will work side-by-side with members of the Law Enforcement and Intelligence Communities and will leverage your experience and skills to have a direct impact on national security. Among other roles, you will work in a multi-agency secure environment to help the sponsor assess the technical approach and quality of an Operations & Maintenance (O&M;) contractor’s products and performance. (FJ07-M) Required Qualifications Linux (10 or more years)SQL Databases (e.g., schemas and replication)Scripting (e.g., Perl, Python, Bash) and proficient in at least one other programming language, such as C/C++ or JavaDemonstrated knowledge of Linux internals (and device drivers) s to assist in performance analysis and troubleshootingNetwork analysisAbility to work with senior government officialsExcellent communication skills
